actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act, to exempt from coverage under the act credit transactions involving extensions of credit for agricultural purposes.

summary.text: Exempts from coverage under the Truth in Lending Act credit transactions involving extensions of credit for agricultural purposes. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 1602(h) and 1603(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act, to exempt from coverage under the act credit transactions involving extensions of credit for agricultural purposes.
